article_title: Teacher brings highs and lows of her experience to the stage
article_text:
ACTIVATE ONLINE SUBSCRIPTION

og.description: Pincus, who taught English and drama but never acted before, brings her experiences — the good and the bad — of teaching to the stage with her one woman show Chalkdust.
